item.title: Road not swept for over 2 wks, 8th December
item.description:
Hi it’s come to my attention that the pavements and road have not been swept of litter and leaves for over 2 wks. There is broken glass, litter, broken up polystyrene and decomposing leaves creating mud. The pavement is slippery and obstructed in places
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Norcott Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights out from 2 lamp posts, 8th December
item.description:

item.title: Street lights not working, 8th December
item.description:
Street lights on even numbers side on Green Lane SE9 from Fiveways junction of A20 to just past Broad Lawn not working for almost a week now. Unsafe for pedestrians and a security risk for the houses

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lane, Eltham

item.title: Van blocking pavement every day, 8th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Crimscott Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
